author: beruic
body:
I got an update yesterday, updating Powershell to version 6.1.1, but cannot findthe changes in the changelog.

I am on Ubuntu 18.04, and I have installed/get updates from the repository at https://packages.microsoft.com/ubuntu/18.04/prod.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
I created a PR to merge the changelogs into master to make them easier to find:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/8283

title: Missing changelog for version 6.1.1
